attributes.action: Start a petition to enable the british courts to issue the death sentence
attributes.additional_details: I believe the british public deserve a re invention of this old custom for criminals who are given a full life sentence, there is no place in society for these people and it is unfair that the families of the victims and the general public should be paying millions of pounds in taxes for the incarceration of these people
attributes.background: Bring back the death penalty, to send a clear message to anyone guilty of terrorism, rape or murder

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Abolish whole life orders and reintroduce the death penalty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700357

Reintroduce the death penalty for people found guilty of terrorism
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710686

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623

Bring back capital punishment for the rape of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711979
